Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp17

Package it.polimi.ingsw.connection.socket.message.serverMessage

package it.polimi.ingsw.connection.socket.message.serverMessage
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ColorRequest
    ColorRequest class used to ask the player for a color
    DrawCardRequest
    DrawCardRequest class used to notify the player that they need to draw
    GoalCardRequest
    GoalCardRequest class used to ask the player to choose a goal card
    JoinGameRequest
    JoinGameRequest class used to make the user choose to join or create a game
    ListenForCommands
    ListenForCommands class make the player be able to use commands
    NotYourTurn
    NotYourTurn class used to end the current player's turn
    PlayCardRequest
    PlayCardRequest class used to ask a client to play a card
    PlayersNumberRequest
    PlayerNumberRequest class used to ask the player how many players will be playing the game
    PlayStartingCardRequest
    PlayStartingCardRequest class used to ask the player which side they want their startingCard to be played
    RefreshGamesNamesResponse
    RefreshGamesNamesResponse class used to set the list of names of available games in the view
    ScoreBoardMessage
    ScoreBoardMessage class used to show the scoreboard
    ServerMessage
    ServerMessage abstract class
    SetPlayerMessage
    SetPlayerMessage class used to set the player in the view
    TextMessage
    TextMessage class used to send text messages to client
    UpdateChatMessage
    UpdateChatMessage class used to send the updated chat to the players
    UpdateGameMessage
    UpdateGameMessage class used to send the updated game to the players
    WaitingForPlayers
    WaitingForPlayers class used to notify the players that more players are needed to start the game
    Winner
    Winner class notifies all the players about the winner of the game
    YourTurn
    YourTurn class used to tell the player that it's its turn
